transcript.text: [Music]
hi and welcome you're listening to the

proposes confiscating gold to crackdown

just want to make an announcement I
placed an interview on the x-22 report
spotlight with Lois cameras on oh you

report spotlight should bring you right

can go to News Sentinel calm save things
scroll down a little bit look over to

the video there let's get into the
economic collapse financial news now
today we can see the market is inching
its way up to 20,000 points and we can
see all over the corporate media the
financial channels they're telling us
that will it get there we don't know and
we see it bobbing up and down as we move
closer and closer to Friday and I still
believe when we look at the situation
right now and what they've been doing it
does appear that they are going to push
the Dow up over 20,000 points when we
hit Friday now of course this is not a
sure thing but when we get into their
heads and what they're thinking what
they're trying to do they're trying to
make everyone believe that the year of
2016 and the eight years that Obama has
been in office the economy has been
incredible and to finish this off what
they need is the Dow at 20,000 points
and we can see we're at like 1950
nineteen you know nineteen thousand five
hundred and forty I should say 19550 and
it's bobbing up and down and what we
really need is 40 to 50 points and that
is very easy for the plunge Protection
Team to do and the high-frequency
traders to push this over the edge here
and I do still suspect that they will do
this on Friday we will see doesn't mean
them right here but it does seem that
this is the direction we're going in
now we know that the you Mitch last time
we reported well it hit all time new
highs it surged everyone has hope and
now we see the conference board is doing
the same exact thing where it is surged
in November from about a hundred and
nine all the way up to about a hundred
and thirteen point seven and we can see
this is all following the same path here
where everyone believes in the illusion
that everything is great now remember
the conference board they receive grants
from the government they're under the
total control of the government and they
pretty much do whatever the government
wants them to do and whatever they want
them to report that's what they do and
we can see that they are now covering
all bases stock market all time new
highs unemployment down to four point
six percent GDP revised to three point
five percent real estate they're trying
to convince us that existing home sales
new home sales with mortgage
applications declining mortgage rates
increasing well they broke all records
and here we are with Case Shiller now
talking about the national home price a
price index saying that according to
October's Case Shiller data that us home
prices have never been higher since July
of 2006 peak now again we have to look
at what's been going on here and if we
look at case-shiller home price year
over year we see that it really hasn't
gone anywhere it's been pretty much
flatlined and actually the prices have
come down if you really look at this
since the height of the market back in
2006 we hit the height of the market in
2013 and it dropped in 2014 and we have
been steadily on a level playing field
which means we're getting ready to drop
once again but of course they need to
play they need to play this all up make
it look like the economy is doing much
much better than it really is and we
could see why they're doing this and one
of the reasons is Obama wants to leave
office with the economy looking like it
has completely recovered it has
recovered completely and it's even
improved compared to 2008 and we know
this is one gigantic illusion because
remember when the market came down in
2008 the stock market was only at 14,000
now when he's leaving office it will be
at 20,000 but we know that all of this
because we've been looking at the hard
data the economic information and this
reminds me of 2008 with the subprime
securities when everyone was believing
that real estate was going to
continually move up the stock market was
going to continually move up that this
party could never end and there were a
few individuals looking into the
subprime security saying there is
something very wrong here and you know
they discovered this back in like
something like 2006 2007 and each year
that went by they couldn't understand
why the economy was still where it was
why didn't it collapse yet well this is
what we're seeing right now because when
we have been looking at all the
underlying data we see that the economy
is flashing collapse we're in a
recession right now it is flashing
collapse right in front of our eyes
we see out in Europe well the ECB is
going to be lowing Deutsche's bank
capital requirements well because they
need to pay bonuses so they're saying
okay you know what don't put as much
into capital requirements don't worry
about that will lower your level this
way you can hand out the bonuses we see
people are taking their funds out of the
banks in Italy Monti DePauw she well
they have capital shortfalls right now
and it looks a lot worse than it did
just a couple of days ago they need to
plug a capital shortfall of about 8.8
billion euros 76% greater than the
previous 5 billion euro gap estimated by
the bank and we see already that things
are
getting worse and worse as time goes on
and things are starting to break down we
see the US Department of Energy well
they're looking to sell off some of its
Strategic Petroleum Reserve as soon as
January and Congress has authorized the
Department of Energy to sell about 375
point four million worth of oil in its
recent budget resolution and they're
saying that the sale of the oil well
that is going to help improve the
storage facilities and we see right now
that these reserves well they're held in
salt caverns in Louisiana and Texas they
were set up decades ago in the aftermath
of the Arab oil embargo in 1973 which
really means that's when the United
States was pushing the petro dollar on
to all these middle eastern states and
they were adjusting everything as we
came off the gold standard the SPR
system can hold more than 700 million
barrels of oil this is the largest
strategic stockpile in the world and the
question is is that really to make
improvements of the storage area or does
the US government central bankers
actually need the funds because as we
can see with facta Gatka and what is
happening here in the united states they
don't have enough revenue being brought
into the government to pay for this debt
and if isn't just rates are moving up
this is going to be a huge problem the
Fed admits that the good old days well
they're never coming back where we saw 5
6 7 8 percent interest rates right now
they're saying well we're not seeing
this we're not going to be returning to
normalcy any time in the future and we
know that the Fed was never gonna bring
the interest rates up that high they
might go that high on their own as the
Fed loses control but we can see that
the Fed raising the interest rates by 25
basis point that was the signal that
this economy is ready to be brought down
because they
let the interest rates move up it would
be a complete disaster the debt the US
government would not be able to service
it the housing industry would come to a
screeching halt and we would have major
problems so to me it really makes no
difference at this point because we're
headed towards a collapse scenario and
they know this they know there's no
other place to go we see out in Europe
where it all started where they were
gonna ban cash we saw it in India we saw
them talking about getting rid of cash
getting rid of the five hundred euro
note and now the European Commission
well they're proposing tightening
controls on cash and precious metals
that are transferred outside of the you
under the guise of shutting down one
route for funding of militant attacks on
the continent after the Berlin Christmas
attack which is a complete false flag
the EU is using the idea that they're
going to go after terrorist financing
they're gonna be going after prepaid
cards they're gonna be going after cash
they're gonna go after precious metals
they're gonna be going after Bitcoin and
part of it is those people who are
carrying more than ten thousand euros in
cash that while they already have to
declare this at customs when entering
the EU the new rules would allow
authorities to seize money below that
threshold where there are suspicions of
criminal activity the Commission is also
considering whether set up EU focused
terrorist financing tracking programs
the Commission is also proposing common
rules for the 28 EU countries on
freezing terrorist financial resources
and confiscating assets even from those
thought to be connected to criminals so
cash bitcoin precious metals prepaid
cards over a hundred and fifty dollars
are all instruments of the terrorists
and they are now open to confiscation if
you are a suspicious
person and we can see why they're doing
this right now because when this system
comes down they will need to confiscate
funds they will need the precious metals
they will need currency they will need
anything they can get their hands on and
they're setting it up of course to say
that they're going after suspicious
people but pretty soon everyone's gonna
be suspicious because if you're carrying
it you're holding it we're coming after
it we're taking it the end and we know
back in 1930s when the Great Depression
hit the government said listen give us
your gold we'll give you $20 for each
ounce and we'll give you paper for your
precious metals now they didn't
confiscate it but in a way they did
because as soon as they took it the
price of gold went up to $35 an ounce so
you were kind of ripped off because they
needed the gold the same thing is going
to happen during this major collapse and
this is why you need to be prepared you
need to make sure that your valuables
are hidden you don't keep them in safety
deposit boxes or anything like that
because don't let anyone know where it
is and never admit that you actually
have it that's my personal opinion
because when this collapse hits the
government they will be looking for
funds
listen everyone thanks a lot for
